results.title: Nicholas Hitchon, Who Aged 7 Years at a Time in ‘Up’ Films, Dies at 65
results.abstract: He was one of the original children profiled in “Seven Up!,” a 1964 British documentary, and reappeared in subsequent installments for more than a half-century.

media.caption: Nick Hitchon at 14 in 1971. He represented the rural child in a film series that sought to portray a cross-section of youngsters from Britain’s economic classes.
